features: The steam mop pads are compatible with PurSteam ThermaPro 10-in-1 Steam Mop Cleaner.
Designed with high density microfiber fibers, HOMEXCEL steam mop pads effortlessly pick up dust, dirt, debris, and pet hairs,and absorb mess water quickly.
The steam mop pads are crafted from premium, soft, ultra-fine fiber materials, ensuring exceptional cleaning efficiency. They possess strong water absorption capabilities and dry quickly.

These steam mop pads replacement are safe for use on all surfaces--hardwood, tile, laminate, marble,wood and other hard surfaces. They are versatile enough to effectively clean glass, mirrors, and even carpets.Great for cleaning your home, office, kitchen, living room and bathroom

Microfiber pads refills are designed for effortless installation and replacement by anyone with their vercro fastener.Not only are they reusable and long-lasting, but they also contribute to environmental sustainability.Plus, they can be machine washed up to 150 times, save your money.

Pick Up Pet Hair Easily Compatible with pursteam thermapro 10-in-1, they are uniquely structured to effectively capture pet hair from your dogs, cats, or other animals. Highly Absorbent The steam mop pads are crafted with a thicker and fluffier design compared to typical microfiber materials, resulting in enhanced absorbency. Work on All Type of Floors Mop pads are designed for safe usage on all types of hardwood and hard-surface floors,ensuring they won't cause any scratches to your floor Resuable&Machine Washable HOMEXCEL steam mop pads are machine washable and can withstand hundreds of uses, providing excellent value and cost savings for your family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loves these as they do a great job
reviews.reviewText: These leave a clean floor using this steam mop and these cloth mops. I throw them in t h e water when they are dirty and they come completely clean easily. I just lay them out to air dry and it doesn't take long at all and they are ready to use again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These work great with Velcro all over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good replacement for original
reviews.reviewText: These are a pretty good generic dupe to replace the original brand mop pads. The 1 feature that's actually better than the original is how well it sticks to the steam mop. The original pads only have little velcro-like spots that you have to perfectly line up with the spots on the mop head, but they never line up perfectly so the pad isn't secured very well. The nice thing about this product is the entire surface of the pad is that velcro-like material, so it'll stick to the mop head no matter where you place it. The only negative thing about these is that they get curled up in the wash, but since the whole surface is velcro it doesn't really matter because you just uncurl the edges as you place it on the mop and it sticks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These pads are thinner than the pads that come with the steam cleaner. I was disappointed. I will still use them because I don't want to buy any more, but I wish I would have returned them.I found after using these they fluffed up and did not seem thin. They work very well and I am happy with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got these to use with my OApier S5 Steam Mop and they work good. They attach easily to the velcro on my steam mop head and don’t fall off. The steam doesn’t take forever to penetrate through the mop pad. These are a good deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have a pursteam mop and this fits perfectly for it.My wife and I have both used them and they work just as well as the ones we got with the unit originally.
